TextLibrary.Text: Ach, lad, ye canna keep the key. 'Tis the property o' my good friend Thallis! I'll ne'er be able to face him again if we canna bring poor Thallis back his key, and we've been pals for so...
Ach, lad, ye canna keep the key. 'Tis the property o' my good friend Thallis! I'll ne'er be able to face him again if we canna bring poor Thallis back his key, and we've been pals for so...
Ach, lass, ye canna keep the key. 'Tis the property o' my good friend Thallis! I'll ne'er be able to face him again if we canna bring poor Thallis back his key, and we've been pals for so...
Ach, lass, ye canna keep the key. 'Tis the property o' my good friend Thallis! I'll ne'er be able to face him again if we canna bring poor Thallis back his key, and we've been pals for so...
But Khalkus, it's only a key!
But Khalkus, it's only a key!
But Khalkus, it's only a key!
But Khalkus, it's only a key!
No, no, no, no, no! 'Tis a precious family heirloom. We Dwarves put great value on the things that we pass down to our children. Why these leather pants belonged to me great uncle Mungo, who...

No, no, no, no, no! 'Tis a precious family heirloom. We Dwarves put great value on the things that we pass down to our children. Why these leather pants belonged to me great uncle Mungo, who...
Enough, Khalkus, I don't want to look at your pants!
Enough, Khalkus, I don't want to look at your pants!
Enough, Khalkus, I don't want to look at your pants!
Enough, Khalkus, I don't want to look at your pants!
